name: Get Boned (Santum)
description:
( THE WEB VERSION SUCKS ASS!!!!!! IF YOU CAN, DOWNLOAD THE GAME INSTEAD THANK YOU :) )

You're at a Halloween party, respecting social distancing guidelines.

But oh no! You aren't respecting them because you're a good person!

You're respecting them because you have no friends to speak to!

Or at all!

Suddenly, a friendly face approaches! Except it looks a little bit... undead.

Will you gain a friend tonight, or will the sins of your past (and present!) lead to you being told to get boned? See? It isn't a sex thing!

(A short Halloween game made in an hour or two while very sleep-deprived)
